body_content.explanation: someone whose job is to control the operation of a business, organization, or plan:
examples: From 1969 to 1971, he was administrator of the Illinois state drug abuse program.
She works as a school administrator.

body_content.explanation: a person who is in charge of the operation of a network of computers, a website, a group of computer users, etc., and is able to make changes to it:
examples: It is now possible for network administrators to download educational software to specific computers across the school's network.
To set up remote access you have to log on as the administrator.
